Hero.Text: Making your dream-housing possible with fewer compromises

People_block.Text1: Find roommates who share your values and lifestyle, unite and conquer: go after desirable listings together or rent a spare room to the right person
People_block.Text2: Smart ‘human-like’ algorithm will quickly match you with roommates who fits your criteria - from age and gender to sleeping habits, smoking and pets

Place_block.Text1: Name your budget and location and choose the right offer
Place_block.Text2: Get a match with perfect room or join forces with others and rent a whole flat together

Household_block.Text: Enjoy your roommates and leave unpleasant staff to the App - payment reminders, duty schedule, household planning etc

Basic.Name: Basic
Basic.Results: View best matches after 'Quick & easy' plan user
Basic.Dialogues: Up to 5 active dialogues with roommates, other tenants & landlords

Premium.Name: Nice and easy
Premium.Results: View best matches first on top of the feed
Premium.Super-like: Don't wait for mutual match - connect right away
Premium.Dialogues: Unlimited active dialogues with roommates, other tenants & landlords

Modal.Text: Roommate.host is in development right now, you can sign up for invite and we notify you when we start beta test.
Modal.Question: What functions are you interested in?
Modal.Point2: I want to rent out my room
Modal.Point3: I want to find people to rent together
Modal.Point4: I want to manage my household
